name: DUNGEON QUEST demo
description:
DUNGEON QUEST IS A TEXT BASED ADVENTURE RPG GAME ABOUT FIGHTING, HUMOR AND OTHER STUFF. YOU WAKE UP IN WHAT SEEMS TO BE A NEVER ENDING DUNGEON.NO ONE HAS EVER BEEN SEEN OR HERD OF AGAIN WHEN ENTERING "WELL YOU DID WAKE UP AND THERE ARE NOT DOORS SO I THINK NO ONE KNOWS YOUR HERE" ON THE OTHER HAND YOUR GOING TO DIE HERE OVER AND OVER FOREVER AS YOU WAKE UP IN THE SAME PLACE AGAIN AFTER DEATH.

FIND THE WAY OUT OF THE DUNGEON

UNCOVER ITS SECRETS AND STUFF

ITEMS TO COLLECT

AND IN A TEXT BASED SYSTEM FOR THAT NOSTALGIC LOOK
